nodes.text: "Sithspit" was a phrase used to express a displeasure or anger at something or someone. Sometime during 34 ABY, the smelter droid 8D-J8 lashed out, calling them "sithspit" when he noticed a First Order shuttle above his business, exclaiming that the First Order will cause him to go out of business.

"Sithspit" first appeared in Galaxy's Edge 1  a comic written by Ethan Sacks and illustrated by Will Sliney. The comic was released on April 24, 2019. "Sithspit" is also mentioned many times in Star Wars Legends, being mentioned in Side Trip, Luke Skywalker and the Shadows of Mindor plus many more.
